privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy is adopted by Sayohat Tour LLC and defines the procedure for collecting, storing and using personal data of users.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We may collect the following data: full name, phone number, email address, passport details (when booking a tour). Data is used exclusively for providing services.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content: Your personal data is used only for processing orders, improving service quality and contacting you.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We apply modern security measures to protect your personal data. Data is not shared with third parties without your consent.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Using this website implies compliance with the following terms and conditions.

general.title: General Terms
general.content: Sayohat Tour conducts tourism activities in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan. The company operates under a license issued by the Tourism Committee of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

booking.title: Booking Terms
booking.content: Advance payment is required to book a tour. Cancellation terms are determined individually for each tour and specified in the contract.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: The company bears full responsibility for fulfilling its obligations. In case of force majeure circumstances, the company is released from liability.
